channel.title: Effective Website Secrets by BasicTemplates.com
channel.description: Get free secrets, tips, tricks, ideas, and resources to assist you in the process of turning an ordinary website into an effective website. Discover the profit-producing secrets behind developing, maintaining, and promoting an effective website. These podcasts are produced by web template designer pioneers, BasicTemplates.com. When you are ready to move past passion and toward effective, you need our podcasts to discover the truth and secrets behind every successful, effective website.

item.title: Effective Website Secrets Podcast 008
item.description: Come along with us as we critique a live website submitted for review by one of our listeners. Learn by example within this podcast and accompanying 3-minute video some of the lessons you learned in our first 7 podcasts. Learn the important difference between a web developer and a graphic designer.

item.title: Effective Website Secrets Podcast 007
item.description: Testing your website's Direct Effective Components (DEC) and tracking your website visitors' behavior and navigation through your website is a must. Upcoming "Back to Basics Web Design Critiques and Reviews" provided free to all podcast listeners. Get your website critique for FREE and start moving toward the development of an effective website.

item.title: Effective Website Secrets Podcast 006
item.description: SSI - server side includes and what it means to your website's development, maintenance and success. What is the best HTML editor? Learn more about our new podcast feature ... "Back to Basics Web Design Critiques and Reviews" provided free to all podcast listeners. Get your website critique for FREE and start moving toward the development of an effective website.

item.title: Effective Website Secrets Podcast 005
item.description: Learn about the only effective method of CSS, why you should be using it on your website, and why it is effective. Also learn about the common "validation" misconception which no one may have told you.

item.title: Effective Website Secrets Podcast 004
item.description: Should you develop your website with Flash? If so, which page components should you use? If not, why not? What are the advantages and disadvantages of using Flash and still have an effective website? Find out the facts regarding this controversial topic.

item.title: Effective Website Secrets Podcast 003
item.description: How much graphics is too much graphics on a web page? What is the prime area of your web page and what should or shouldn't be there? What web graphic concepts do the most successful websites use?

item.title: Effective Website Secrets Podcast 002
item.description: Learn the basics on how to move toward an effective website by looking beyond any passions that may be hindering your success and then targeting your market. Avoid the backward website development trap.

item.title: Effective Website Secrets Podcast 001
item.description: In this, our first podcast, we explain the fundamentals of any serious website's critical foundation. This is a must-listen-to-and-follow podcast or your website will be ineffective from the get go. It's not always pleasant to hear the truth, but necessary to understand if you want to get real with your website.
